Package com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.clients

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.clients.Client
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Group, User

    public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.Main client class, that contains all necessary methods and fields for base work with VK and longpoll server
